title: 2nd Digital China Exhibition held in Fuzhou, China's Fujian
content: Photo taken on May 5, 2019 shows the booth of Xinhua News Agency at the 2nd Digital China Exhibition in Fuzhou, southeast China's Fujian Province. The 2nd Digital China Exhibition runs from May 5 to 9 at the Fuzhou Strait International Conference &Exhibition Center. (Xinhua/Wei Peiquan)
